Docs.summary: The CoreGraphics namespace provides access to a C-based low-level 2D graphics API.

remarks.para: This namespace contains a binding to the two-dimensional, bitmap and vector graphic APIs. To learn more about the capabilities of MonoTouch.CoreGraphics you can read Apple's Quartz 2D Programming Guide.

Many graphics use-cases can be addressed using higher-level APIs such as those provided in , , and . However, some Core Graphics classes such as , , and are not uncommonly seen in general UI tasks. In such situations, the Core Graphics class will often have more flexibility in terms of lower-level manipulation but requires more attention from the developer in terms of resource and state management.
